education.courses: Operating Systems, Data Structures, Analysis Of Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Recommendation Systems, CV, NLP, Networking, Databases

responsibilities: Working in the R&D team on designing, evaluating, and deploying computer vision models for real-world applications.
Implemented CV pipelines involving image preprocessing, classification, object detection, and verification using deep learning frameworks and nvidia deepstream engines.
Built intelligent AI agents i.e. end-to-end database agents using NLP techniques as part of the research and development team.
Designed responsive user interfaces for applications using Flutter.
Integrated Firebase APIs and managed backend services for real-time updates.
Worked on deployment and cloud integration for scalable mobile applications.

Assisted in Data Structures, Operating Systems, and Artificial Intelligence courses by mentoring students, evaluating projects and quizzes, and supporting lab sessions and programming assignments across multiple semesters.

projects.name: Document Based QA Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a QA chatbot using Langchain, FaissDB for indexing, and LLAMA2 for document understanding. Deployed with Streamlit.

projects.name: Resume-Job Matching System
projects.technologies: Python, NLP, NER, Topic Modeling, Optimization
projects.description: Built a bilateral recommendation system to match resumes with job descriptions using Named Entity Recognition (NER) and topic modeling to extract key skills and roles. Employed a constraint-based optimization framework to ensure balanced assignments based on expertise, job coverage, and workload.

projects.name: Realtime Verification for Authorized Person (FACENET)
projects.description: Developed a real-time face recognition system to verify authorized personnel using webcam feed. Achieved an accuracy of 92% using a FaceNet embedding-based approach.

projects.name: Ontology Based Course Teacher Assignment
projects.description: Designed a detailed ontology of university teachers and courses to support automated teacher-course assignments. Used RDF Turtle for ontology creation and Python for reasoning and answering competency questions.

projects.name: Ecommerce Website
projects.technologies: Django, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Python
projects.description: Built an e-commerce site for a laptop store using Django, with features like cart sessions, user authentication, product reviews, and price prediction via ML.

projects.name: Other Projects
projects.description: Realtime Chatting Application in Flutter x Firebase || Detailed PowerBI Reports and Analysis using MS Excel on various datasets || Music Player in Java Swing (DSA)|| Inventory Management System in Java (OOP)|| Parallel Analysis of Sorting Algorithms using OpenMP || Divide and Conquer Algorithm Visualizer in Python for Closet Pair, and Multiplication Problem

awards.title: 3 x Gold Medalist | 1st Position in AI Department (4.00 SGPA) - Rectors List Of Honors | Fall 2023 | Spring 2024 | Fall 2025
Deans' List: Earned name on Dean's List (3.61 SGPA) - 2nd Semester - Spring 23

volunteer.description: Engaged with companies to organize events, secure sponsorships, and coordinate job fairs impacting over 3000 students.
